name: The Adventure Of Monster Slayer
description:
Late Night you're developing your game, then suddenly you feel tired, but your game has an error so you left your game opened, then you sleep before you wake up you're transported in your game world which you're the protagonist, so your goal is to finish the game to get back to your real world.

Controls:

AWSD - Movement Key Arrows - Movement

F - Attack

J - Fireball

K - Barrier

L - Rage Mode

Esc - Menu
